attributes.action: Deport any immigrant who is found guilty of a crime whilst living in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any person seeking refuge in this country should be sent back home if they turn to crime. Why should the tax payers pay for them to stay in our prisons which are already overcrowded?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
